name: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Gold Edition
summary:
Call of Duty: Black Ops takes you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. With access to exclusive weaponry and equipment, your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

Included with the Gold Edition is the first DLC pack "First Strike" contains 5 incredibly diverse maps spanning the globe, featuring 4 multiplayer maps and a new Zombie experience. This edition was available only in Europe via the PlayStation Store.
